environments.platform_detector module

Platform detection system for dual environment setup.

This module provides automatic platform detection, hardware capability detection, and platform validation functions for M1 Mac and Ubuntu VM environments.

class environments.platform_detector.PlatformInfo(platform: str, architecture: str, has_mps: bool, has_sdr: bool, python_version: str, recommended_packages: List[str])[source]

class environments.platform_detector.PlatformDetector[source]

Bases: object

Platform detection and validation system.

Automatically detects M1 Mac vs Ubuntu VM environments and provides hardware capability information for optimal environment setup.
